# DockerShimContext.LoggingConsoleStdout property

A text writer that writes to [`LoggerFactory`](LoggerFactory.md). You must explicitly request a log event by calling one of the `WriteLine` methods.

```csharp
public TextWriter LoggingConsoleStdout { get; }
```
